head.title: selector-type-case

selector-type-case

Specify lowercase or uppercase for type selectors.

Options

string: "lower"|"upper"

"lower"

The following patterns…

body:
# selector-type-case

Specify lowercase or uppercase for type selectors.

    a {}
/** ↑
 * This is type selector */

# Options

string: "lower"|"upper"

# "lower"

The following patterns are considered warnings:

A {}

LI {}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a {}

li {}

# "upper"

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a {}

li {}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

A {}

LI {}
rawBody:
# selector-type-case

Specify lowercase or uppercase for type selectors.

```css
    a {}
/** ↑
 * This is type selector */
```

## Options

`string`: `"lower"|"upper"`

### `"lower"`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
A {}
```

```css
LI {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a {}
```

```css
li {}
```

### `"upper"`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a {}
```

```css
li {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
A {}
```

```css
LI {}
```
raw:
---
title: selector-type-case
---

# selector-type-case

Specify lowercase or uppercase for type selectors.

```css
    a {}
/** ↑
 * This is type selector */
```

## Options

`string`: `"lower"|"upper"`

### `"lower"`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
A {}
```

```css
LI {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a {}
```

```css
li {}
```

### `"upper"`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a {}
```

```css
li {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
A {}
```

```css
LI {}
```
